item.description:
Hi, Movie Lovers!

Sorry for the last-minute meetup, but how would you like to go see The Dark Knight this coming Monday night?

Let's meet at 6:30 p.m. outside the theater and head in at 6:40ish to buy tickets ($8.50 each for FMM members and their guests) and goodies. Then we'll head to Friday's to have a nibble.

Please RSVP! As always, guests are welcome. Just please include them in your RSVP.

My cell number for any changes in RSVPs after 5:00 on Monday (or if you get lost or will be late): 508/308-4897.

--Dana
item.name: The Dark Knight
